name: Arashi
description:
2017 Graduation Video Game Prototype - June, 2017

PITCH

Arashi est un jeu de course sur plate-forme prenant place dans une ville futuriste/cyberpunk. Nous jouons Arashi, une freerunneuse équipée d'amélioration cybernétique.

Arashi is a racing-platformer taking place in a futuristic/cyberpunk city. We play as Arashi, a freerunner equipped with cybernetic enhancement.

DETAILS

Developer : OniTeam (student project) ArtFX - Montpellier (France)
Release : June 2017
Game plateform : PC
Genre : Racing-Platformer
Language : English (menus) ; Game without text or voice
PEGI 7 (not officially rated)

CREDITS

Martin TESTARD - Game Design / Project management
Thomas THURET - Game Design
Guilhem DESBROUSSES  - Game Art / Communication
Morgan BOUKIER-MARTINEZ - Game Art
Luc PINTO-CAPELLE - Game Art 
Loïc JOURNO - Sound Design
Axel DUROU - Sound Design
